data.quote: A crow doesn't pick out another crow's eyes.
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: God created the beard on himself first
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: Strike while the iron is hot
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: An attractive appearance may be deceptive. It may cover or hide a much less favourable content
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: It is supposed that if there is a rumour, there must be some truth behind it
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: Who digs a trap for others ends up in it himself
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: The morning is wiser than the evening
data.author: Serbian Proverb

data.quote: An apple doesn't fall far from the tree
data.author: Serbian Proverb
